xuiExpander
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Expander component.

Usage

as element:
<xui-expander
       is-open="{boolean}"
       heading="{string}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}"
       on-status-changed="{function}">
</xui-expander>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
is-openboolean

Whether expander should be expanded by default.

(default: false)

headingstring

Heading text.

is-disabledboolean

Whether the expander should be disabled.

(default: false)

on-status-changedfunction

If this function is set, receives IExpanderChangeArgs object in case of opening or closing the expander.

(default: null)

Example
